Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I found a giant square engine in my B9 parts, cant remember the exact part number, but it has two modes...Hybrid/plasma and closed cycle. I hooked two engines up with two suggested nuclear power plants and built a huge lifter to test. In closed cycle mode at about 75k altitude, heading into orbit, the whole lifter just zoomed out of the camera range and was just a blue speck far in the distance...was this a glitch? I didnt get a chance to do a screenshot. It just accelerated away so fast, it was crazy... Just wondering. I can post some pictures of the lifter when I get home from work

EDIT: I tried many times to get the engines to repeat the strange event, with no luck, I guess it was just a one time thing.

Edited March 13, 2015 by vixr
Not a glitch, unrelated to B9... It can happen it stock. Just zoom back in, no harm done.
